activity-description.narrative: The project will focus its assistance in the urban and peri-urban areas of Aleg (Wilaya de Brakna), Kaedi (Wilaya de Gorgol), Seilibaby (Wilaya de Guidimaka), Tidjikdja (Wilaya de Tagant), Rosso (Wilaya de Trarza) and the capital city of Nouakchott.
